alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 12:41PM MST until January 22 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause localized blowing snow. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized blowing snow will reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
